name: Sumbul

Heart: Neuralgia around left breast and left hypochondriac region
Aching in left arm, heavy, numb and weary
Head: Emotional and fidgety
Dull in morning, clear in evening
Mistakes in writing and adding
Comedones
Tenacious, yellow, mucus in nose
Female: OILY PELLICLE ON SURFACE OF URINE

details: Has many hysterical and nervous symptoms, and is of use in neuralgic affections and anomalous, functional, cardiac disorders. NUMBNESS ON BECOMING COLD. Numbness on left side. INSOMNIA of delirium tremens (fifteen drops of tincture). Sensation as if water dropped down spine. Asthma. A tissue remedy for sclerosed arteries.
dosage: Tincture, to third potency. Dr. W. McGeorge advises the 2x every 3 hours for arteriosclerosis.
